Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Madhavan
Reviews.Content: I just bought this laptop for my personal use for browsing, video chat etc.,. This laptop is really very user friendly and it consists of windows 8 and all applications were doing really great. I would strongly recommend this laptop.Thanks,Madhavan

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the Price
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop in Christmas for my Dad, and  e're very happy with it. It comes with Windows 8 pre-installed, 6GB RAM and the Core i3 processor, provides a very good performance in most applications.

Reviews.Title: Nice reasonable laptop
Reviews.Author: bob harris
Reviews.Content: this laptop is quite reasonably priced and operates fast, efficient, and covers a lot of information I like having at my fingertips. Windows 8 is quite like a tablet layout. I like this laptop.

Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: Shawn Smith
Reviews.Content: i was advised to get a dell laptop since the company generally makes good laptops. i got this one at a good steal. great specs, nice look. performance is up to par.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Bought it early 2013. Since I was used with XP, the change to windows 8 was time consuming. But later ( after 6 months) I like it. It is fast. Sometimes getting re-connected to the wireless router is not easy !! eventhough there was no change other than closing and opening again the laptop ( not even switching off). If it happened, then need to reboot the system. But I have another laptop which is almost 5y old doesn't have this issue. Interestingly the wireless router is also brand new. Besides this glitch, everything else is fine with the system.

Reviews.Title: The motherboard was defective, had to return it
Reviews.Author: Boris S. Rodriguez "Boris Sanchez"
Reviews.Content: I receiver the computer, connected it and would not work. I calem the dellservice and, after An. Hour of testing, they concludente the problem was the motherboard. I would need to approach a revive center and want 15 das for repair. I returned it immediately and amazon refunded me in no time. Great amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Not so sure about Windows 8, jury is still out if the "upgrade" to Windows 8 is worth it.Over all the laptop is easy to use for day to day computing, surfing the web, looking at pictures etc.The touch pad does take some getting used to.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous laptop
Reviews.Author: James Conkle
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop for my grandson. Contrary to popular belief windows 8 is a pleasure. I think maybe the older generation will complain.It is fast and everything this kid will need for the next 5 years.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Glen W. Jones
Reviews.Content: I've had this computer for nearly a month now and it works great and I've had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: BEVERLY A. CARROLL
Reviews.Content: I was worried about getting the new Windows 8, but now I am glad I did get it.  Microsoft really has changed the Windows as we have known them.  It is NOTHING like the previous ones we have had before. It is so amazing with what they came up with.  I am still learning all the new changes.  Now for the Dell product? It is a very nice laptop. The problem that I had was the end of the DVD door kept falling off. I went ahead and returned it. Amazon couldn't replace it. It was out of stock. I went ahead and ordered another Dell but it is 17", and has more specs that are greater. I first started with the Dell Desktop and later the Dell Laptop. After that stage, I got the Toshiba Laptops.  Now I am back with Dell and am staying there.  It shows so much quality and this Silver color is beautiful. The outer edge is a light silver and the rest looks like medium brush aluminum color.  It is heavier than the others I had. I wouldn't want to carry it all over the place. I just use mine in my home. It runs really cooler than the older ones did.  It turns on really fast and the whole system runs fast. There is no cons here. The problem I did have was really odd, but I still want the same type of laptop. I am sure if you did order this, after it is restocked, you won't have any problems and I know that you will love it, too. I hate the idea when I do get the new one, I will have to put my settings and programs all back in, again. That does take a lot of time. I definitely would recommend that you buy a Dell laptop. It is the way to go.
